title: Ekko q slow changes reverted... Why ?
body: especially when the change was so well received by the community...

replies.body: We're still considering changing Ekko's Q slow to scale with AP instead of rank. We also want to test out removing the slow from his passive however instead, so we're trying that instead of the Q changes right now. Work in progress change list basically.
why is AP ekko's winrate still at 48% despite getting buffed 4 times in a row? what do think if this ap ekko buff goes through and his winrate is still 48%.

> [{quoted}](name=MunchCrunchLunch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7587RhmB,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-05-20T00:58:26.434+0000)
>
> why is AP ekko's winrate still at 48% despite getting buffed 4 times in a row? what do think if this ap ekko buff goes through and his winrate is still 48%.

Nerfing a base and buffing a ratio doesn't necessarily buff his AP build, it just doesn't nerf the ap build.

I mean they shaved like 30 damage off his bases and give him an extra 20% off his ap. so i think its a buff. they buffed his E by 0.2 and reduced the base damage by 40 or 30 i believe so if you have 600 AP your getting an extra  120 damage.. so far every buff has been for the ap ekko and nerf for the tank.
When you have lots os AP its clearly a buff, but makes his early game weaker

> [{quoted}](name=MunchCrunchLunch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7587RhmB,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-05-20T00:58:26.434+0000)
>
> why is AP ekko's winrate still at 48% despite getting buffed 4 times in a row? what do think if this ap ekko buff goes through and his winrate is still 48%.

AP ekko is still an unreliable squishy. That's not gonna be that great in this game unless you are low elo. He can't stick to you forever and well he isn't going to be ulting you unless you want to be ulted by him so giving him more damage doesnt really matter.

As an Ekko main who only likes playing AP Ekko I personally like the removal of the slow from his passive more than the scaling Q, mostly because that strong slow on his Q is one of the only ways to really get that second hit off with his Q since it is pretty easy to dodge that second hit if you aren't slowed as hard as you get after it has been upgraded a bit. Also the slow on his passive is the main reason he is so oppressive as tank Ekko because it is an easy to confirm strong slow unlike his Q and W which are much harder to land which makes getting that strong CC from them fair in my opinion.
no, landing the Q isnt that easy, removing his passive slow will kill ap ekko literally.

but removing slow on passive is a huge nerf to AP Ekko and will kill him.. and i figured out from your posts guys that u want to nerf tank ekko without affecting AP Ekko negatively, so i dont understnad why removing his passive slow instead of making his q slow scale with ap??
